name: Sandman (notPJ)
description:
Sandman is game where you have to try and wake Gavin up before he's late! The kicker is you only have 30 seconds to do so and he's borderline narcoleptic, immediately falling asleep as soon as he's awakened. Can he actually be woken up? Try to find out!

Click the buttons as they appear as quickly and as many times as you can. Each time you complete a set Gavin will be woken up momentarily. Try to wake him up!

Controls

  • WASD

Music is by the oh-so-lovely bro, c: games! You can find him on Twitter here!

This is a quick one week project, only took me a few hours- I tried a new art style and I really liked how it came out! Hope you get some enjoyment out of it :)

Find me on

Twitter!
